metadata.title: CVE-2024-57392 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Proftpd commit 4017eff8 allows a remoteattacker to execute arbitrary code and can cause a Denial of Service (DoS)on the FTP service by sending a maliciously crafted message to the ProFTPDservice port.

criterions.comment: proftpd-dfsg package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
